Text: Re Working Session on February I attend Let me know your thoughts Scott Doug Kinney AM To Scott olumbiaGas David olumbiaGas cc Subject Working Session on February FYI Forwarded by Doug KinneyCESColumbiaGas on AM pEnergycom on PM Please respond to pEnergycom To cc Subject Working Session on February Southern is hosting a meeting for AGL and the certificated marketers on February from am pm CCT at our offices in Birmingham AL This meeting is designed to provide a working session for all attendees to reach agreement on the mechanics of allocating deliveries when nonotice service is acquired by the marketers We encourage everyone to participate and limit the number of attendees to two people per company to keep the size manageable Please contact Lisa Guthrie at if you need more people from your organization to attend Attached is an invitation and RSVP to be completed and returned by Noon on Monday February You can reply by email to Peggy Jones at or by fax at The Tutwiler Hotel is a block walk from our offices and currently has availability To make a reservation for the night of February please call and tell them you are with Sonat to receive the per night rate while availability lasts If you have any questions regarding the meeting please contact me or your account manager This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed If you have received this email in error please notify the sender invitedoc
Re TCO Capacityto cover market area requirments on PM Please respond to To Scott OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject TCO Capacity Is the TCO capacity from Eagle Point considered Retail or Wholesale

Re Storage QuestionsI think John replied to this In addition Enron can use the TCO storage in any manner you choose Scott on AM Please respond to To Scott OLUMBIAGAS cc John Hodge NOTESjwhodgeLMSOV Subject Storage Questions I have storage questions for now Cove Point LNG its my understanding that this is a LNG peaking facility The current balance is dth Did you have a withdrawal schedule or were you going to use this as peaking gas TCO contract has capacity of BCF and I think your current storage balance is about BCF What is your withdrawal schedule for Jan thanks
Re January ActivityI will funnel my information through John to make life somewhat easier Scott
Re TCO Capacityto cover market area requirments on PM Please respond to To Scott OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject TCO Capacity Is the TCO capacity from Eagle Point considered Retail or Wholesale
